file_insights.changes_summary: Added detailed Cloudflare Workers configuration tasks and architecture documentation

patterns_discovered: Modular Workers project structure with TypeScript
Comprehensive middleware and routing setup with Hono framework
gotchas_discovered: Need for careful environment variable and secret management
Complexity of setting up multi-environment Cloudflare Workers configuration
Importance of proper TypeScript type definitions for Worker bindings

approach_outcome.main_goal: Add tasks for Workers project setup with Wrangler, routing configuration, and integration points with main site

recommendations: Use Hono framework for robust routing and middleware
Implement comprehensive error handling and logging
Utilize TypeScript for strong type safety
Set up extensive middleware for security and performance
